attributes.action: raise the minimum driving age to 20 for learners and 21 for qualified drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statistics have shown that most accidents involve drivers of below 21 years of age, and many people will be aware that this tends to be the 'boy racer' period. Therefore, in order to lower accidents and fatalities on the roads, the minimum driving age for learners should be raised to 20, whilst the minimum age once qualified be raised to 21.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
